A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Undeveloped characters\, non-climactic climaxes\, and a plot that screamed\, \"we'll throw in humor every 90-120 seconds to hide this film's shortcomings\". So disappointed; thought Disney deserved a second chance\, but I for one will not be seeing anymore Star Wars movies. It's sad to see the death of a legendary epic and the birth of a monetized shit-show.
